definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China

sentences.english: Binbin and Yaoyao are going to write with pens.
sentences.chinese: 彬彬和瑶瑶正准备要用蜡笔来写。

sentences.english: A little crayon drawing, with annoying transparent strips on it.
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔画，有些透明的条子在上面，比较讨厌。

sentences.english: Offer your child thick crayons and paper to scribble on.
sentences.chinese: 提供些粗蜡笔及厚纸任孩子涂鸦。

sentences.english: These are the newest red Crayola crayons.
sentences.chinese: 这是最新的红色克雷奥拉蜡笔。

sentences.english: Today, I used green and brown crayon drawing of a magic tree.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我用绿色和褐色的蜡笔画了一棵神奇的大树。

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
They play with crayons, paints, and clay, so they are artists.
sentences.chinese: 他们玩蜡笔，色彩涂料，粘土，所以他们都是艺术家。

sentences.english: This picture totally uses the crayon drawing.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画完全是用蜡笔画旳。

sentences.english: White crayon, draw a game belongs to our wedding.
sentences.chinese: 用白色蜡笔，画一场属于我们的婚礼。

sentences.english: He works on what he calls his unfinished paintings by drawing on them using pastels.
sentences.chinese: 他正在用用过的蜡笔填充他所称之为未完成的画作。

sentences.english: And our own line of selective bred Pastels .
sentences.chinese: 和我们自己的选择育成蜡笔。

sentences.english: This trend can be seen in Wild Planet's Crayola-branded Crayon Town.
sentences.chinese: 这种趋势可以看出，野生行星的克雷奥拉品牌蜡笔镇。

sentences.english: LL: Well, my mom tells me that once I got out a box of crayons and drew a rainbow on the wall of our kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 你用蜡笔在厨房的墙上画彩虹？

sentences.english: He takes one of the crayons and tosses it into a little paper bag.
sentences.chinese: 他采取蜡笔的当中一个和扔它入一个小的纸袋。

definition: Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
